field.name: summary
field.value: Components created by FactoryActivator have their dependencies checked

field.name: description
field.value:
Attached is a test case that shows the issue and quirk I was having. Mainly that Components configured to be created by the FactoryActivator with dependencies that can not be satisfied by the container can not be resolved, despite the factory being able to resolve the dependencies.
The quirk I was having was due to the IConversionManager implementation. Some constructor parameters have ITypeConverters registered which set the dependancytype to parameter and they get ignored. hence Hashtable being ok but not stringdictionarys
